name: Click Manga: Dynamic Robot Taisen 2: Kyoufu! Akuma Zoku Fukkatsu
overview: Click Manga - Dynamic Robot Taisen is an interactive comic based on popular Japanese Super Robot manga series & characters (like Mazinger Z, Getter Robo, Combattler V, etc). There was 2 games in this interactive comic series since the story of the part 2 continue from the first game. Click Manga - Dynamic Robot Taisen 2 is also divided into 7 chapters. The gameplay is that you have to solve some puzzles or click with the pointer in a comic book scene to advance to the next scene.
